thread.title: Great Hotel, Great Location, Fantastic Team
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, Great Location, Fantastic Team - Review of Hyatt Union Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Henning V
title: Great Hotel, Great Location, Fantastic Team
text:
The Hyatt Union Square is my go to hotel in New York. The location is fantastic for both business and fun with easy access to east/west and north/south subway lines.
The rooms are very comfortable and nicely furnished, the hotel bar and restaurant are good and for those who like to explore there are countless more within a short distance.
Most of all, the hotel staff is one of the nicest I've ever met.
